items.sentence: I was born in Boston, but I moved to Chicago after I graduated from college.
Tom knew that Mary was very unlikely to be able to do what she wanted to do.
Tom got to the airport three hours before his flight was scheduled to leave.
We know that it's going to happen. We just hope that it doesn't happen here.
Tom is fluent enough in French that many people think he's a native speaker.
Tom didn't like his office, so he asked his boss to let him use another one.
When the teacher asked for volunteers, Tom raised his hand, but Mary didn't.
I want to tell you something, but it's a secret. Promise not to tell anyone.
I'm glad I wasn't the one who had to tell Tom that his wife had been killed.
Carrots are good for your eyes. Have you ever seen a rabbit wearing glasses?
